CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "Party - Members of the Homestead Community Centre and the YMCA Celtics held a joint social and recreational party at the Centre Avenue YMCA last Wednesday. Some of the girls who attended the affair were (left to right): Jane Dickerson, Grace Hodson and Susan Wynn, all of Homestead Community Centre."
TitMainTitle: Homestead Community Centre members Jane Dickerson, Grace Hodson, and Susan Wynn, standing around record player on table in Centre Avenue YMCA
